nodes.label: 沈王爷
nodes.info: Lord Shen is the main antagonist in Kung Fu Panda 2. He was the son of the royal Peacock family and the heir to the Gongmen City throne.

nodes.label: 悍娇虎
nodes.info: 师父的得意弟子，盖世五侠之首，性格严厉。

nodes.label: 阿宝
nodes.info: 在面条店长大的熊猫阿宝，从小做着功夫梦，终于有一天阴错阳差地成为神龙大侠……

nodes.label: 羊仙姑
nodes.info: The Soothsayer is an aged goat who was named for her unique gifts and abilities; it is unknown if she ever had a previous name. She serves as a supporting character in Kung Fu Panda 2.
